Game of the Year.description: Recognizing a game that delivers the absolute best experience across all creative and technical fields.

nominees.Description: A psychological horror game that follows the story of a writer trapped in a nightmare.
A role-playing game set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe, offering deep narrative and complex character interactions.
An action-adventure game featuring Spider-Man as he battles new and familiar foes in New York City.
A survival horror game where players face terrifying enemies in a bid to rescue the President's daughter.
A platformer that brings new mechanics and levels to the beloved Super Mario series.

nominees.Nominee: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
nominees.Description: An action-adventure game where Link embarks on a journey to save Hyrule.

Best Game Direction.description: Awarded for outstanding creative vision and innovation in game direction and design.

Best Adaptation.description: Recognizing outstanding creative work that faithfully and authentically adapts a video game to another entertainment medium

nominees.Description: An animated series adaptation that brings the iconic vampire hunting saga to life.
A racing game that offers realistic driving experiences with a wide range of cars and tracks.
An adaptation that follows the emotional journey of survival in a post-apocalyptic world.
An animated film bringing the adventures of Mario and Luigi to the big screen.
A series that combines high-octane vehicle combat with dark humor and thrilling action.

Best Narrative.description: For outstanding storytelling and narrative development in a game.

nominees.Description: A psychological horror game that follows the story of a writer trapped in a nightmare.

Best Art Direction.description: For outstanding creative and/or technical achievement in artistic design and animation.

nominees.Description: A psychological horror game that follows the story of a writer trapped in a nightmare.

An action RPG inspired by the story of Pinocchio, featuring dark and challenging gameplay.

Best Score and Music.description: For outstanding music, inclusive of score, original song and/or licensed soundtrack.

Best Audio Design.description: Recognizing the best in-game audio and sound design.

nominees.Description: A psychological horror game that follows the story of a writer trapped in a nightmare.
A survival horror game set in space, where players confront grotesque creatures and unravel a terrifying mystery.
An action-rhythm game that combines musical elements with fast-paced gameplay.
An action-adventure game featuring Spider-Man as he battles new and familiar foes in New York City.
A survival horror game where players face terrifying enemies in a bid to rescue the President's daughter.

Best Performance.description: Awarded to an individual for voice-over acting, motion, and/or performance capture.

Innovation in Accessibility.description: Recognizing software and/or hardware that is pushing the medium forward by adding features, technology and content to help games be played and enjoyed by an even wider audience.

nominees.Description: An action RPG set in a dark fantasy world, featuring intense combat and deep character customization.
A racing simulation game that offers realistic driving experiences with a wide range of vehicles and tracks.
An action-rhythm game that combines musical elements with fast-paced gameplay.
An action-adventure game featuring Spider-Man as he battles new and familiar foes in New York City.

Games for Impact.description: For a thought-provoking game with a pro-social meaning or message.

nominees.Description: An adventure game that explores the relationship between a boy and a girl with supernatural powers.
A puzzle-adventure game where players decipher an ancient language to unravel the mysteries of a forgotten civilization.
A narrative-adventure game set in a high school for dinosaur students facing the end of an era.
An exploration-adventure game where players navigate a tropical archipelago and interact with its unique flora and fauna.
A simulation-strategy game focused on ecosystem restoration and environmental management.
A narrative-driven cooking game that explores cultural and familial themes.

Best Ongoing Game.description: Awarded to a game for outstanding development of ongoing content that evolves the player experience over time.

nominees.Description: A battle royale game that features a diverse cast of characters, each with unique abilities.
A massively multiplayer online role-playing game set in the Final Fantasy universe, with ongoing content updates.
A battle royale game known for its building mechanics, frequent updates, and crossovers with popular media.
An action RPG set in a vast open world, where players can explore, fight, and unlock characters.

Best Community Support.description: Recognizing a game for outstanding community support, transparency and responsiveness, inclusive of social media activity and game updates/patches.

nominees.Description: A role-playing game set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe, offering deep narrative and complex character interactions.
An online multiplayer shooter with expansive lore, cooperative gameplay, and regular updates.
A massively multiplayer online role-playing game set in the Final Fantasy universe, with ongoing content updates.

Best Independent Game.description: For outstanding creative and technical achievement in a game made outside the traditional publisher system.

nominees.Description: A puzzle-adventure game that invites players to explore intricate worlds and solve complex puzzles.
A simulation-adventure game where players dive into the ocean to discover marine life and mysteries.
An adventure-simulation game where players manage a fishing boat and uncover the secrets of the deep sea.
An RPG that combines classic turn-based combat with a vibrant world and compelling narrative.
A puzzle-adventure game that challenges players to manipulate perspectives to solve puzzles.

Best Debut Indie Game.description: For the best debut game created by a new independent studio.

nominees.Description: A puzzle-adventure game that invites players to explore intricate worlds and solve complex puzzles.
An adventure-simulation game where players manage a fishing boat and uncover the secrets of the deep sea.
A narrative-driven cooking game that explores cultural and familial themes.
A puzzle-adventure game that challenges players to manipulate perspectives to solve puzzles.

Best Mobile Game.description: For the best game playable on a mobile device.

nominees.Description: An RPG set in a sci-fi universe, offering strategic combat and an engaging storyline.
A simulation-adventure game featuring beloved characters in a charming island setting.
An augmented reality RPG that brings the monster-hunting experience to mobile devices.
A simulation-strategy game focused on ecosystem restoration and environmental management.

Best VR/AR Game.description: For the best game experience playable in virtual or augmented reality, irrespective of platform.

Best Action Game.description: For the best game in the action genre focused primarily on combat.

nominees.Nominee: Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon

nominees.Description: An action-rhythm game that combines musical elements with fast-paced gameplay.

Best Action/Adventure Game.description: For the best action/adventure game, combining combat with traversal and puzzle solving.

Best RPG.description: For the best game designed with rich player character customization and progression, including massively multiplayer experiences.

nominees.Description: A role-playing game set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe, offering deep narrative and complex character interactions.
A role-playing game with a rich storyline and engaging combat set in a fantasy world.
An action RPG inspired by the story of Pinocchio, featuring dark and challenging gameplay.

Best Fighting Game.description: For the best game designed primarily around head-to-head combat.

Best Family Game.description: For the best game appropriate for family play, irrespective of genre or platform.

nominees.Description: A platformer that brings new mechanics and levels to the beloved Super Mario series.

Best Sim/Strategy Game.description: Best game focused on real time or turn-based simulation or strategy gameplay, irrespective of platform.

Best Sports/Racing.description: For the best traditional and non-traditional sports and racing game.

nominees.Description: A racing simulation game that offers realistic driving experiences with a wide range of vehicles and tracks.

Best Multiplayer.description: For outstanding online multiplayer gameplay and design, including co-op and massively multiplayer experiences, irrespective of game genre or platform.

nominees.Description: A role-playing game set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe, offering deep narrative and complex character interactions.
An action RPG set in a dark fantasy world, featuring intense combat and deep character customization.
A platformer that brings new mechanics and levels to the beloved Super Mario series.

Most Anticipated Game.description: Recognizing an announced game that has demonstrably illustrated potential to push the gaming medium forward.

Content Creator of the Year.description: For a streamer or content creator who has made an important and positive impact on the community in 2023.

Best Esports Game.description: For the game that has delivered the best overall esports experience to players (inclusive of tournaments, community support and content updates), irrespective of genre or platform.

Best Esports Athlete.description: The esports athlete judged to be the most outstanding for performance and conduct in 2023, irrespective of game.

Best Esports Team.description: Recognizing a specific esports team for outstanding performance in 2023, irrespective of game.

Best Esports Coach.description: The esports coach judged to be the most outstanding for performance and conduct in 2023.

Best Esports Event.description: Recognizing an event (across single or multiple days) that delivered a best-of-class experience for participants and the broadcast audience.
